name: Laravel + Voyager
postCreateCommand: composer create-project --prefer-dist laravel/laravel . && composer require tcg/voyager:^1.8 && cp .env.example .env && php artisan key:generate && sed -i 's/DB_DATABASE=laravel/DB_DATABASE=codespaces/' .env && sed -i 's/DB_USERNAME=root/DB_USERNAME/vscode/' .env && sed -i 's/DB_PASSWORD=/DB_PASSWORD:/' .env && php artisan migrate && php artisan voyager:install --with-dummy && php artisan voyager:admin admin@admin.com --create --no-interaction
